content: this motif was used in a tablecloth made by my grandmother in the 1950 s i couldn t find a copy of the original pattern so in order to properly repair some damage it became necessary to recreate it read about my restoration efforts in my blog entries grandma s tablecloth 1 grandma s tablecloth - the finishing details 2 1 http //ladynthread blogspot com/2008/05/grandmas-tablecloth html 2 http //ladynthread blogspot com/2008/07/grandamas-tablecloth-finishing-details html
